hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=6100 Main St, Houston, TX 77005, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We are looking for technically advanced solutions to technically challenging problems that make use of hardware and API's. That being said, if you can solve a technically challenging problem with a simple solution, we will be very impressed!
We are looking for aesthetically pleasing projects with smooth and clear user experience.
We are looking for original ideas or new angles on existing ideas.
We are looking for socially good projects that people would use.

hackathon-description-header: HR 7.5 - by Rice students, for Rice students.
hackathon-location-description: Liu Idea Lab for Innovation & Entrepreneurship, Rice University
